problems.title: Check if Array is Sorted (Recursive)
problems.description:
Given an array of N integers, check if it is sorted in non-decreasing order using recursion.

Input Format:
First line: integer N.
Second line: N integers separated by space.

Output Format:
Print "YES" if the array is sorted, otherwise "NO".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
1 2 2 4 5

Sample Output
YES

Sample Input
4
3 2 1 0

Sample Output
NO
hintsList: Check pairwise: if n <= 1 it's sorted. Otherwise ensure arr[n-2] <= arr[n-1] and recurse on size n-1.
